attributes.additional_details: The greatest threat facing our economy, and civilian’s financial and general wellbeing is the impact of climate change. We ask the government to prioritise these long-term needs and support the public to make this transition by reinstating the abandoned policies.
attributes.background: Yesterday, the government announced a U-turn on its (e.g. delaying the ban on new diesel cars, delaying the move away from gas boilers). The government is considering further green policy abandonment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Keep the promise to ban diesel and petrol cars in 2030:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644662
